mapper.update: update c_equiptype set equiptypeid=equiptypeid ,equiptypecode=#{equiptypecode} ,equiptypename=#{equiptypename} ,sequno=#{sequno} where equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid}

update c_equiptype set equiptypeid=equiptypeid ,equiptypecode=#{equiptypecode} ,equiptypename=#{equiptypename} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,sequno=#{sequno} where 1=1 and equiptypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and equiptypeid =#{Where_Id} and equiptypeid=#{Where_equiptypeid} and equiptypecode=#{Where_equiptypecode} and equiptypename=#{Where_equiptypename} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and sequno=#{Where_sequno}
mapper.select: select t.equiptypeid "equiptypeid", t.equiptypecode "equiptypecode", t.equiptypename "equiptypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_equiptype t where equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid}

select t.equiptypeid "equiptypeid", t.equiptypecode "equiptypecode", t.equiptypename "equiptypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_equiptype t where 1=1 and t.equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid} and t.equiptypecode=#{equiptypecode} and t.equiptypename=#{equiptypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}

select t.equiptypeid "equiptypeid", t.equiptypecode "equiptypecode", t.equiptypename "equiptypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_equiptype t where 1=1 and t.equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid} and t.equiptypecode=#{equiptypecode} and t.equiptypename=#{equiptypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}
mapper.delete: delete from c_equiptype where 1=1 and equiptypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and equiptypeid =#{Where_Id} and equiptypeid=#{Where_equiptypeid} and equiptypecode=#{Where_equiptypecode} and equiptypename=#{Where_equiptypename} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and sequno=#{Where_sequno}
mapper.select: select t.equiptypeid "equiptypeid", t.equiptypecode "equiptypecode", t.equiptypename "equiptypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_equiptype t where 1=1 and t.equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid} and t.equiptypecode=#{equiptypecode} and t.equiptypename=#{equiptypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}

select count(*) from c_equiptype t where 1=1 and t.equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid} and t.equiptypeid!=#{NoId} and t.equiptypecode=#{equiptypecode} and t.equiptypename=#{equiptypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}
